Also confirmed for version 3.1.2.

Jaap, did you mean 3.2.1 ?

What (if anything) does the RCP app override/reconfigure? Dragging a view over an empty editor area seems to work in base eclipse...although a quick look at this code does show that it's suspicious at best...


Is this still an issue ?
I believe that this was fixed indirectly when the "bug" that allowed a view to be opened in the editor area was fixed in eclipse 3.2. With 3.2 you can't drag a view on the editor area anymore (the drop hilight sticks around the editor area) so this bug, if still present, can't be hit anymore.


Marco, thanks for the update.

Barring input to the contrary I'll believe you and mark this as FIXED.
